name: LonePoint (HDJenga)
description:
LonePoint is a Multiplayer FPS centered around it's movement and customizability. You will be able to Sprint, Slide, Strafe, Wall Run, Double Jump, ext. This Game is going to be highly customizable so you can play how you want to play.

Join The Community: https://discord.gg/XaT6Dj6rn7
